aboutUs.title: WHO ARE WE?
aboutUs.description: At Rentarica, we are dedicated to helping you explore the best vacation destinations in the Dominican Republic. Whether you're looking to buy a property, rent a property, or invest in real estate, our team of experts is here to guide you every step of the way. We pride ourselves on providing personalized service to ensure all our clients have a memorable and pleasant experience. You can trust that your properties are in good hands with Rentarica, allowing you to relax and enjoy the benefits of your real estate investment. Contact us today to learn more about how we can help you achieve your real estate goals in the Dominican Republic.

serviceCards.internationalFairsDescription: We organize international fairs for developers looking to expand their exposure and achieve greater sales and profitability in their projects.
serviceCards.salesAndRentalsDescription: We facilitate the quick and effective sale and rental of properties, connecting you with the best buyers and tenants.
serviceCards.administrationAndReservationsDescription: We manage and take care of your property while generating short-term reservations and providing excellent customer service, maximizing profitability and taking care of every detail for a worry-free experience.
serviceCards.conciergeDescription: Personalized service to cover all your needs and ensure a unique experience in every detail of your vacation.
serviceCards.eventAccommodationManagementDescription: We manage accommodations for your event guests, ensuring excellent customer service, comfort, and convenience.
serviceCards.turnkeyDescription: We offer a comprehensive service that takes care of everything from purchasing everything your property needs to management, so you only have to enjoy.
serviceCards.rentaricaOwnersClubDescription: Discover all the benefits Rentarica offers when you join our family of owners and partners.
serviceCards.advertiseWithUsDescription: Promote your project, property, or business with us and reach a broad and qualified audience.

message_form.title: Leave us a message
message_form.name: Name
message_form.event_info: Would you like info about any fair or event?

register.title: Sell or Rent Your Property: Start Here!
register.description1: As part of our effort to optimize and streamline this process, we have developed a form that will help us efficiently collect crucial information about your needs.
register.description2: Within each classification are our offered services. When filling it out, don't forget to choose whether it is for sale or short-term rental.
register.description3: Each button takes you to the link where you will complete the form based on the type of property and what you want to do with it.
register.additionalInfo1: If you have any questions, need help, or don’t have all the information at hand, don’t hesitate to fill out the form. We will contact you and complete everything along the way.
register.additionalInfo2: We are here to assist you every step of the way.

investments.title: Let Us Advise You
investments.description: Explore unique investment opportunities in the Dominican Republic. Whether you are interested in strategically located land, pre-construction projects, industrial warehouses for rent, or fully completed properties, we are here to guide you towards secure and profitable investments. With our team of experts, your investment is backed by knowledge, experience, and trust.

slots.title: Land
slots.description: Purchase strategically located land in high-growth areas. Ideal for commercial, residential, or tourism developments.

projects.title: Pre-Construction Projects
projects.description: Invest in projects at early stages with competitive prices and high appreciation potential.

warehouses.title: Industrial Warehouses
warehouses.description: Rent or buy industrial warehouses in key locations, perfect for logistics, manufacturing, or storage businesses.

finishedProperties.title: Completed Properties
finishedProperties.description: Acquire fully finished properties ready to generate income, from apartments to commercial spaces.

invest.fairDescription1: At Rentarica, we connect dreams with opportunities through our international real estate fairs. We take pride in being a bridge between developers and expatriates interested in investing in the Dominican Republic, creating a space where innovation, entertainment, and opportunities meet.
invest.fairDescription2: With over 10 successful real estate fairs, we have proven our ability to produce events that not only generate profitable results for developers but also offer a unique, enriching, and entertaining experience for attendees.
invest.fairTitle2: Make Your Goals a Reality with Rentarica
invest.fairDescription3: Would you like to organize an international fair with us or find your dream property? We are here to guide you every step of the way. With Rentarica, every event and investment comes with the experience and commitment of a team dedicated to your success. Ready to get started?
